titleStmt.title: A narrative of the great success God hath been pleased to give His Highness forces in Jamaica, against the King of Spains forces; together with a true relation of the Spaniards losing their plate-fleet, as it was communicated in a letter from the Governour of Jamaica. Published by His Highness special command.
titleStmt.author: Doyley, Edward.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, and John Field, printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
